new processor to fix db partition mapping issue

entry.value: -l;${"logdir"};-s;${"sourcesystem"};-c;${"country"};-e;"150";-m;"Reverse Data Copy XML Parser Add DB Partition Mapping Failed"

processors.name: Logging - Add DB Partition Mapping Attribute

labels.label: This needs to be to the staging dir

If the wait processor expires, this indicates that for a given source system and country the tables that don't need to be detokenised were not saved properly to HDP
From here, an acknowledgement of the failure will be written to the local file system. The flow can be replayed to try again from the first processor in this process group, or from the first processor of the whole flow
Please allow time for the bash script to run
Data Transfer to Staging for Detokenisation
Restarts for this section of the flow can be triggered from this processor
